Show / Hide Table of Contents

Class HotkeyAttribute

The HotkeyAttribute is used to provide hotkeys for the Node Editor. 'priority' can additionally be specified. A priority over or equals hundred will be called AFTER the GUI Method Signature must be [ Return: Void; Params: NodeEditorInputInfo ]
